description: This file contains test cases for the DeepInfra model integration with the Agent class, including synchronous and asynchronous tests, memory handling, structured output, and history management.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for testing structured output responses, representing a movie script with title, genre, and plot.

methods.name: _assert_metrics
methods.description: A helper function to verify that the metrics in the response contain positive token counts and that total tokens equal the sum of input and output tokens.

methods.name: test_basic
methods.description: Tests the basic synchronous run of the agent with a simple prompt.

methods.name: test_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the streaming response of the agent synchronously.

methods.name: test_async_basic
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous run of the agent.

methods.name: test_async_basic_stream
methods.description: Tests the asynchronous streaming response of the agent.

methods.name: test_with_memory
methods.description: Tests the agent's memory feature, ensuring conversation history is maintained.

methods.name: test_structured_output
methods.description: Tests the agent's ability to produce structured output conforming to a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_history
methods.description: Tests the history management with SQLite storage, verifying message count increases with each interaction.
